name: full-stack-open-phonebook-back-end
description: Back-end part of the phonebook app for the Full Stack Open Course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../full-stack-open-phonebook-back-end
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
